title: Redeem your NymVPN free pass
description: You can try out NymVPN for free if you have a received a code by email or in a direct message

getStarted.label: Enter code
getStarted.warning: You will only be able to download the free pass once, so please make sure you are using a device where you copy the free pass into the NymVPN app, or keep it somewhere safe like a password manager

issuing.label: Get free pass
issuing.info: Your free pass will be valid for one week from today. So please make sure you use it before it expires!

download.label: Copy into app
download.description: ðŸŽ‰ Your free pass is downloading as a file in the background and is also ready to copy and paste into the NymVPN app
download.info: Your free pass will be valid for one week from today. So please make sure you use it before it expires!

errors.invalidCode: The code you provided is invalid
errors.alreadyRedeemed: The code you provided has already been redeemed
